title: Lower priority Queue?
body: I was playing and after I had lost, I walked away from the PC without hitting continue, now when I logged in to play it said I was in a lower priority Queue with a wait time of 10 minutes? I had played, I lost, I didn't quit,  and I didn't AFK. Why am I being punished? I don't understand this hypersensitive leaver penalty? It's crazy ridiculous.

replies.body: You didn't go AFK at all during the match that you had played? I find it pretty odd that you'd get any sort of Leaverbuster penalty without going AFK at all during the match.
I had for a little while, long enough to make a quick 3 minute phone call, but I didn't have any pop-up warnings about leave-buster or being AFK.

Being away from a match for 3 minutes or longer may have been what triggered the Leaverbuster system, especially if you had left or gone AFK at all recently.

You can find out more about the Leaverbuster System in our [**FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.
